main event: On June 25, 1958, Ms. M V Vinck observed lights in the sky hovering, suddenly accelerating and disappearing in Tacoma, Washington.
interesting points: The object was reported to hover before rapidly accelerating out of sight.,The duration of the observation was approximately one minute.,The object was classified as a light.,Ms. Vinck is the only confirmed witness.,There was speculation that the observed lights might have been a character of a meteor.
